snippet.title: Flotsam Gameplay at the Indie Arena Booth 2018
snippet.description:
This is the Flotsam segment of the videostream courtesy of Indie Arena Booth at Gamescom 2018 presented by Skrolnn (https://www.twitch.tv/skrolnn). 
Live gameplay of Flotsam can be seen with a Q&A with one of the game developers.

Keep in mind that nothing seen here is final and very likely will change before release.

Source: https://www.twitch.tv/videos/300410790?t=07h15m30s

Wishlist the game here: https://store.steampowered.com/app/821250/Flotsam/
Join us on Discord: http://discord.gg/flotsam
The official website: http://flotsamgame.com
